Package com.appboy.dispatch

Interface Summary
IDispatchManager  
IDispatchPolicy  
 

Class Summary
AutomaticDispatchDecorator Automatically schedules flush requests based on a timer, who's policy/interval is informed by the current connectivity state.
BatteryState  
ConnectivityState  
DispatchManager The dispatcher is used to queue and process outbound requests.
DispatchPolicy Responsible for reacting to events that may affect the ability of the sdk to execute network calls.
ErrorReportingThreadFactory Factory that creates new threads on demand.
ErrorReportingUncaughtExceptionHandler Handler that is invoked when an uncaught exception has reaches the thread.
